short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser into a dynamic and mesmerizing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The vibrant design showcases a glowing floral pattern surrounded by flames and fluid waves, symbolizing balance and harmony between opposing forces. This theme is perfect for users who appreciate bold, energetic visuals and seek inspiration in their digital workspace.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
